Description of incident: "We are contacting you to alert you to unusual login activity on your account(s), which began on or after March 25, 2016.  We believe someone may have obtained your username and password from a non-Schwab account or website that you use and tried them successfully on Schwab.com.  This type of account access can occur when you use the same username and password on multiple sites."The information compromised included names, account numbers, positions and transaction history. More Information: http://www.dfr.vermont.gov/sites/default/files/Schwab%20data%20security%...
